TopicTitle: Ksp (steam) is lauching in windowed mode but nothing happens

Articles.Content: I had to re install ksp (steam) after i failed to intsall ro/rp1 and now when i open the game it launches in windowed mode with a black screen no audio no nothing ive re installed it 4 times and the same thing keeps happening

Try uninstalling, then reinstalling in a different location? e.g. if installing through Steam you get a prompt for where to install it, create a new location and install it there. Uninstalling then manually deleting any leftover folders might also help?
A new location as what context a new folder another country?

2 hours ago, Samie16 said:

A new location as what context a new folder another country?

In a different folder.
